title: Mask Use Clarification for Persons With an Accommodation
url: https://www.umc.edu/news/Campus-Memo/2023/01/Mask Use Clarification for Persons With an Accommodation.html
cleaned_text: Clarification for Persons With an Accommodation Friday, Jan. 27, 2023 TO:All UMMC Personnel FROM:Dr. Alan Jones, Associate Vice Chancellor for Clinical Affairs SUBJECT: Mask Use Clarification for Persons With an Accommodation A clarification to the earlier announcement that [mask use is no longer a requirement](https://umc.edu/news/Campus-Memo/2023/01/Mask%20Use%20Optional%20in%20All%20Areas.html) in all UMMC areas, unless there are specific protocols that require it: - The Medical Center's COVID-19 vaccination policy has not changed. Any person who was granted an accommodation must continue to comply with the terms of that accommodation. Thank you.
